full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RDO RJE BSRUNG MA RNAMS LA 'PHRIN LAS DRAG PO GNYER DU GTAD PA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA DAM CAN DMAG DPUNG BSKUL BA'I RNGA SGRA DRAG PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES RDO RJE BSRUNG MA RNAMS LA 'PHRIN LAS DRAG PO GNYER DU GTAD PA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA DAM CAN DMAG DPUNG BSKUL BA'I RNGA SGRA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAM SRI SNYING LA BZHUGS PA'I SKYE BO 'GA' ZHIG GIS NYES MED DU BRNYAS SHING MTHO 'TSAMS PAR BZOD PA BSTEN KHUL BGYIS PA, 'KHOS @005A *, ,'KHYER ZHAN PAR GO STE GNOD 'TSE BSAM SBYOR GTING RJE ZAB KYIS MGO LA TIL BRDUNGS BYED PAR BRTZOM PA NA, BSTAN BSRUNG DAM CAN RGYA MTSOR RA MDA' SPRO NA PA'I PHYIR DU, SMYON PA DHARMA BADZRA GYIS KHOS 'KHRUGS RNGAMS PA'I SEMS KYIS BYUNG RGYAL DU SMRA BA'O, ,YANG RU 'DREN DANG DREG PA GZHAN GYI DMAG BSKUL MI BYED NA,) RKYOB SONG SDIG MO SDIG CIR RGYUG ,(CES PA'I 'PHRO LA) DMIGS BYA DAM NYAMS DGRA PO 'DI, (ZHES SOGS 'THUR CING,) SROG DBUGS LEN PA'I BDUD DU PHOB, (ZHES PA'I 'PHRO LA,) STOD KYI TSA PA'I NAD RIGS RNAMS, (ZHES PA MAN CHAD SBYAR BAR BYA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU RNAMS BDUD DANG MI MTHUN PHYOGS THAMS CAD LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I RU MTSON SRID RTZE'I BAR DU SBGRENGS PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
